definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: strong, stout, mighty;—´[[ח]] Ex 10:19 + 18 t.; f. [[חֲזׇקָה]] Ex 3:19 + 31 t. + Ez Eze 3:14 (Co for MT vb. 3 fs.); pl. [[חֲזׇקִים]] Ju Jdg 18:25 + 2 t.; cstr. [[חִזְקֵי]] Ez Eze 2:4 (del. Co. v. infr.) Eze 3:7; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of men, rarely pred. Nu 13:18 (opp. [[רָפֶה]]), v:Nu 13:31 (compar. c. [[מִן]]), Jos 14:11, Jos 17:18 (all JE), Ju Jdg 18:26 (compar. c. [[מִן]]); also of [[גּׁאֲלָם]] Je 50:34, Pr 23:11; of hand of ´[[י]] Jos 4:24 (D), so Ez Eze 3:14 LXX Co (v. supr. and [[חָזַק]]

definitions.title: Qal 3
definitions.body: ); cf. of Tyre [[הָֽיְתָה חֲזׇקָה בַּיָּם]] Ez Eze 26:17 (del. B Co).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: usu. attrib.; of ram of Pharaoh Ez Eze 30:22 (opp. [[נִשְׁבָָּרֶת]]); esp. of hand of ´[[י]] in delivering Isr. from Egypt, Ex 3:19 (gloss ? v. Di), Ex 6:1, Ex 6:1, Ex 13:9 (all J), De 6:21, De 7:8, De 9:26, Da 9:15; in wonders done by agency of Moses De 34:12; also [[בְּכׂחַ גָּדוֹל וּבְיָד חֲזׇקָה]] Ex 31:11(JE), cf. Ne 1:10, but oftener [[ביד חזקה וּבִזְרוֹעַ נְטוּיָה]] De 4:34 De 5:15, De 7:19, De 11:2, De 26:6, Je 32:21, Ps 136:12; of control of enemies and ,deliverance from exile Ez Eze 20:33, Eze 20:34; more gen. De 3:24 (‖[[גָּדְלְךָ]]), 1Ki 8:42 = 2Ch 6:32; of ´[[י]]'s opposition to Zedekiah Je 21:5; once of Edom, opp. Isr. [[בעם כבד וביד חזקה]] Nu 20:20 (JE).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of sword of ´[[י]] Is 27:1 (‖[[הַקָּשָׁה וְהַגְּדוֹלָה]]), of wind Ex 10:19 (J), 1Ki 19:11; sound of trumpet (= loud) Ex 19:16 (E).

definitions.title: d
definitions.body: severe, sharp, hot, of war 1Sa 14:52 (pred.), battle 2Sa 11:15, sickness 1Ki 17:17 (pred.), famine 1Ki 18:2.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: firm, hard, of face, [[פנים]] Ez Eze 3:8, forehead, [[מֵחַח]] v:Eze 3:8; adamant, sim. of forehead v:Eze 3:9 (compar., c. [[מִן]]); of sky Job 37:18 (pred.) In pl. cstr. [[לֵב]] ´[[ח]] Ez Eze 2:4 hard of heart (‖[[קְשֵׁי פָנִים]]) but om. B Co, [[־מֵחַח]]´[[ח]] Eze 3:7 hard (= impudent) of forehead (‖[[קְשֵׁי־לֵב]]).

as subst., a strong one, of ´[[י]] ([[בְּחָוׇק]], as, in the character of, a strong one) Is 40:10; of ´[[י]]'s agent Is 28:2 (‖[[אַמִּץ]]); v. also [[וְחָזׇק לאׂ יְאַמֵּץ כׂחוֹ]] Am 2:14; c. [[מִן]] comp.= one too strong for Je 31:11, Ps 35:10. In Ez Eze 34:16 MT uses ´[[הח]] in bad sense (‖[[הִשְּׁמֵנָה]]), LXX Co, with diff. text, in good sense (v. VB).
